item.title: The dual simplex method, an introduction
item.description: The primal simplex method provides an algorithmic means for solving linear programs (hereinafter LPs.) This document motivates, defines, and applies the so-called dual simplex method, a slight variant which is useful for performing post hoc sensitivity analysis on LPs solved by the simplex method. The primal simplex method In this section, we review the three steps of the usual primal method, following [Hillier-Lieberman], Frederick S. Hillier and Gerald J. Lieberman, Introduction to operations research, 10th ed.
